Cloud Point

Instantly identify cloud types with AI and learn what they mean for the weather.

Download on the App Store See features Privacy policy

Cloud Point helps you capture the sky, identify cloud formations (from cumulus to cirrostratus and beyond), and understand what those clouds can signal about upcoming weather. Perfect for curious minds, students, photographers, hikers, and anyone who’s ever looked up and wondered what’s going on up there.

Why you’ll love it

AI cloud identification

Snap a photo or upload one from your library and get a best-guess cloud type with confidence.

Climate Science impact!

Each photo you upload has a direct & tangible impact on the world of climate science!

Learn as you go

Concise explanations for each cloud type: typical conditions, formation, and weather implications.

Your sky gallery

Build a personal log of cloud sightings and share your favorite captures.

Location-based

See where everyone else's photos have been taken.

Privacy-respecting

Clear controls and a straightforward privacy policy. Your photos are yours and yours alone.

How it works

  1. Capture: Open Cloud Point and take a photo of the sky (or choose one from Photos).
  2. Identify: The app analyses features like texture, altitude cues, and structure to suggest a cloud type.
  3. Understand: Read a short explainer about that cloud and what it can indicate.
  4. Save & share: Keep your favorite shots or share them with the community.

Screenshots

Get Cloud Point

FAQ

Does Cloud Point work offline?

Unfortunately no, an internet connection is required to identify & view others' photos. However, don't let that stop you from taking pictures for later identification!

If I upload an image, will everyone else see it?

It is your choice! You can choose to share your capture with the world or keep it private.

Which devices are supported?

Cloud Point runs on iPhone and iPad running recent versions of iOS/iPadOS. Check the App Store listing for specifics.

How do you handle my data?

We keep things simple and transparent. Read the Privacy Policy for details.

Is it free?

Everyone gets access to upload images to the platform, however this is capped for free users (running the servers costs money!). To support the app, you can subscribe monthly or yearly for unlimited uploads.

Support

Questions or feedback? Email cloud.point88@gmail.com.

Version & updates

Last updated: 2025-09-06. See the App Store for release notes.
